basics.name: Rajesh Kumar
basics.label: Site Reliability Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Certified Kubernetes Administrator with 8+ years of experience in the IT industry, working with various software containerization and orchestration platforms, source code management tools, automation and integration tools, and cloud service providers

work.name: Infracloud Technologies
work.summary: I help clients adopt and optimize cloud-native technologies such as Kubernetes, GitOps, Service Mesh, and Istio. I have successfully delivered multiple projects involving installation, configuration, automation, and troubleshooting of these tools, using my skills in Linux, Docker, Ansible, Terraform, Golang, Python, and Shell scripting.
